thread.title: 'I know of no widespread voter fraud,' Secretary of State Ruth Johnson says
thread.title_full: 'I know of no widespread voter fraud,' Secretary of State Ruth Johnson says

author: Lauren Gibbons | lgibbon2@mlive.com
title: 'I know of no widespread voter fraud,' Secretary of State Ruth Johnson says
text: Michigan Secretary of State Ruth Johnson is sticking by the integrity of the state's voting process, telling reporters Michigan likely isn't plagued with widespread voter fraud even as President Donald Trump looks to initiate a nationwide investigation into the matter.
